MetaData.MetaDataItem: Smart Energy Plug In Switch for UK
TZ88E Smart Energy Plug In Switch for UK

ChangeLog.Entry: Initial Metadata Import from Z-Wave Alliance Database - https://products.z-wavealliance.org/products/785/xml
Updated Metadata Import from Z-Wave Alliance Database - https://products.z-wavealliance.org/products/786/xml
Updated Metadata Import from Z-Wave Alliance Database - https://products.z-wavealliance.org/products/787/xml

Value.label: Watt meter report period
Value.Help: If the setting is configured for 1 hour (value=720), the TZ88 will report its instant power consumption every 1 hour.

Value.label: kWh meter report period
Value.Help: If the setting is configured for 1 hour (value=6), the TZ88 will report its accumulated power consumption (kWh) every 1 hour.
